short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An unofficial browser extension that improves the user experience of Voices.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an unofficial (i.e., not affiliated with or developed by Voices.com) browser extension that improves the user experience of Voices.com in a number of ways, including streamlining the user interface layout and workflow, allowing you to make local edits to Sample Scripts inline on Job Details pages, notifying you of new job invitations and when clients have listened to or shortlisted your auditions, helping you analyze poor VoiceMatch scores, etc.
